These other techniques include: — facilitative methods that aim to achieve voluntary resolution by the parties; — methods that result in recommendations that become binding if both parties agree; — determinative methods that are binding only when the complainant accepts the decision; — agreements to participate in dispute resolution made after the dispute arises. C.4 Consent to participate after the dispute arises Where consent to participate in determinative dispute
